top_comments_top.body: TWO! members of the Germs are being inducted into the Rock and Roll hall of fame this year.    Belinda Carlisle of the Go-Gos was in the Germs at first.
Honestly, the Rock and Roll hall of fame induction is a joke. Many people should be in who are not. Many people are in who should not.
It's good to see Kraftwerk get something since people like JayZ all sampled them.
I’m happy Randy Rhodes is finally being recognized!
I misread and thought, the LATE Ozzy?
